0: First 2020 ad? This Trump ad, featuring his campaign manager @parscale, just aired on CNN. It’s a minute long and asks viewers to call an 800 number to leave a thank you message for POTUS. I called the number and it leads to a fundraising appeal (not unusual for pres campaigns) pic.twitter.com/yB3Rb1pJKe — Yashar Ali 🐘 (@yashar) December 18, 2018 NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR It seems President Donald Trump‘s re-election campaign has come up with their first ad for 2020, and it involves you calling the president, giving your thanks and singing his praises. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Yes, really. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Campaign manager Brad Parscale narrates the ad, asking people to get on their phones and “deliver a personal thank you” to Trump for making America great again or whatever. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “We need to let President Trump know that we appreciate what he’s doing for America,” Parscale said. “I need you to call the number on your screen and deliver a thank you to President Trump.” NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The rest of it was…well, just watch above.
